Html:
Hi ,
any one have idea of how to run the task schedular in load balancing Environment.

is it possible to run the Taskschedular in load balancing envirronment.since i need to make my server high availability.
please help me out.
The library is not thread safe so you will need to manage thread compartmentalization on your own and create a new instance of the TaskService in each thread.

Hi dahall,
         thanks for the reply.
